form.label: Zeek NTLM (V2.0)
form.description: V2 Additions: Dashboard Now Rides The Zeek_Suite Datamodel

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.NTLM by NTLM.domainname,NTLM.server_tree_name,NTLM.server_dns_computer_name,NTLM.src,NTLM.dest,NTLM.username | rename NTLM.domainname AS domainname,NTLM.server_tree_name AS server_tree_name,NTLM.server_dns_computer_name AS server_dns_computer_name,NTLM.src AS src,NTLM.dest AS dest,NTLM.username AS username
| eval domainname=upper(domainname) | where !like (domainname, "$") | where !like (username, "%$") | where like (username, "%.da") OR like (username, "%.adm") or like (username, "Administrator")
| sort by -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "domainname"="No Instances Found"] | rename domainname AS "Domain Name", server_tree_name AS "Domain Address", server_dns_computer_name AS "FQDN", src AS "Source IP", dest AS "Destination IP", username AS User, count AS Count

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.NTLM by NTLM.domainname,NTLM.server_tree_name,NTLM.server_dns_computer_name,NTLM.src,NTLM.dest,NTLM.username | rename NTLM.domainname AS domainname,NTLM.server_tree_name AS server_tree_name,NTLM.server_dns_computer_name AS server_dns_computer_name,NTLM.src AS src,NTLM.dest AS dest,NTLM.username AS username
| eval domainname=upper(domainname) | where !like (domainname, "$") | where !like (username, "%$") | where like (username, "%.svc") OR like (username, "%svc%")
| sort by -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "domainname"="No Instances Found"] | rename domainname AS "Domain Name", server_tree_name AS "Domain Address", server_dns_computer_name AS "FQDN", src AS "Source IP", dest AS "Destination IP", username AS User, count AS Count
